lyrics:
20 contributorsnever gonna give you up lyricschorus
never gonna give you up
no matter how you treat me
never gonna give you up
so dont you think of leavin

verse 1
girl you treat me bad and i know why
ive seen you runnin around with another guy
and you think if you hurt me then ill go away
but ive made up my mind you know im im here to stay

chorus
never gonna give you up
no matter how you treat me
never gonna give you up
so dont you think of leavin

postchorus
baby dont you understand what youre doing to the man

verse 2
do you see these tears theyre in my eyes
theres no use in lyin cause i really cried
you think you gonna take me and put me on the shelf
id rather die than see you with somebody else
you might also likechorus
never gonna give you up
no matter how you treat me
never gonna give you up
so dont you think of leavin

postchorus
baby dont you understand what youre doing to the man

verse 3
well my friends all say that im your fool
and youre using me like a carpenter uses a tool
i know their intentions theyre all very good
some of them would help me if they could

chorus
but im never gonna give you up
no matter how you treat me
never gonna give you up
so dont you think of leavin

postchorus
baby dont you understand what youre doing to the man
